document.docAuthor: Kment, Petr, Jindra, Zdeněk & Berchi, Gavril Marius
document.masterDocTitle: Review of West-Palaearctic Hebridae with description of a new species and redescription of Hebrus fulvinervis (Hemiptera: Heteroptera)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of West-Palaearctic Hebridae with description of a new species and redescription of Hebrus fulvinervis (Hemiptera: Heteroptera)

bibRefCitation.author: Thomson
bibRefCitation.refString: Thomson, C. G. (1871) Bidrag till Sveriges insect. fauna (2). In: Thomson, C. G. (Ed.), Opuscula Entomologica. Vol. 4. Lund, pp. 361 - 397.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Hebrus ruficeps
Thomson, 1871 : 395
. Syntype(s): sex not indicated, Sweden, Skåne, Ringsjön (MZLU).
Hebrus ruficeps var. transversalis
Rey, 1893 : 109
. Syntype(s): Carpathian Mts. (probably lost).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 73. Distribution of
Hebrus
ruficeps
Thomson
, 1871
(green).

subSubSection.paragraph:
The species was listed from Bosnia Herzegovina by Andersen (1995) , probably based on Lindberg’s (1922) record from the locality Ilidze, which probably is a misidentification of
H. fulvinervis
recorded from the same locality by Benedek (1970) .
